name: Reputation Mechanisms
short_description: This site provide two reputation mechanisms: (i) one to help an agent on identifying how another agent (the evaluator) evaluates the behavior of its partners; and (ii) another mechanism that estimates the reputation value the agent will receive if it interacts with such evaluator. The first mechanism analyzes a set of reputation values provided by the evaluator to its partners and estimates the behavioral pattern being followed by such agent when providing the reputation values. Then, the second mechanism, based on the identified behavioral pattern, estimates the reputation value the agent will receive and the certainty degree of such value that is calculated based on the difference among the reputation values.
